bibl.title: Bishops in the Papyri.
bibl.note: This study has as a focal point three specific areas as they relate to bishops in the papyri: 1) names, 2) secular functions, 3) and the increasing use of adjectives to express non-secular perceptions of bishops. - Pp. 585-587: Appendix 1. Names of bishops in the papyri; - Appendix 2. Ἐπίσκοπος τοῦ / τῆς; - Appendix 3. Honorific titles for bishops.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists

bibl.seg: MORRIS Royce L.B., Bishops in the Papyri.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 582-587, 3 tabl.

This study has as a focal point three specific areas as they relate to bishops in the papyri: 1) names, 2) secular functions, 3) and the increasing use of adjectives to express non-secular perceptions of bishops. - Pp. 585-587: Appendix 1. Names of bishops in the papyri; - Appendix 2. Ἐπίσκοπος τοῦ / τῆς; - Appendix 3. Honorific titles for bishops.
